ai-kv6.5:1.3_0: the refugeless, the immeasurable, the one who refuges, the best,
ai-kv6.5:1.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:1.5_0: the attainment of cessation, the unconditioned, the unconditioned.
ai-kv6.5:1.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:1.11_0: two on which they were told. ...
ai-kv6.5:1.13_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:2.3_0: There are ascetics and brahmins who do so. They make an effort to get them, and they make them go to bed.
ai-kv6.5:2.5_0: Where there is such a thing, they make give rise to rise up, settle down, and laypeople.
ai-kv6.5:2.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:3.1_0: and you give rise to cessation.
ai-kv6.5:3.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:3.5_0: As they cease first, then physical, then mental.
ai-kv6.5:3.7_0: Unable to attain the first absorption, verbal, and mental processes cease.
ai-kv6.5:3.8_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:3.9_0: Experiencing the cessation of the mind, then physical, then verbal.
ai-kv6.5:3.11_0: Unproclaimed first, then physical processes arise first, then verbal.
ai-kv6.5:3.12_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:4.6_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:5.1_0: With the cessation of seclusion, the mind slants, slopes, and inclines to seclusion.
ai-kv6.5:5.3_0: With a mind without simply reflection, they slant, slope, and incline to seclusion.
ai-kv6.5:5.4_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:6.5_0: And you don’t keep on doing it.
ai-kv6.5:6.6_0: Therefore the attainment of cessation is the unconditioned.
ai-kv6.5:6.7_0: The account of the attainment of cessation is finished.
